name: AI-Adam
slogan: AI-Adam provides technical recruiting and talent acquisition in Artificial Intelligence
description:
AI-Adam chat bot coming soon - Artificial Intelligence, Robotics, Data Science, Big Data, Analytics, Machine Learning & Deep Learning 

At AI-Adam we focus on Intelligent and efficient sourcing by using Predictive Analytics to Improve Sourcing. During the sourcing process at AI-Adam, predictive analytics models can identify stronger candidates more quickly and accurately than traditional methods.

AI sourcing that uses predictive models can provide our team with a solid slate of candidates as soon as a requisition is opened, giving our clients a strong head start to secure the best talent.

team.title: Co-founder & Business Advisor
team.name: Adam Rabinovitch
team.bioHtml: Senior Technical Recruiter EMEA @Databricks

team.title: Technical Recruiter
team.name: Sinead Simmons
team.bioHtml: Technical Recruiter in the procurement of rare talent to the world’s most challenging industry sectors in Artificial Intelligence, Engineering, Machine Learning

team.title: Technical advisor
team.name: Paul Harrison
team.bioHtml: Data scientist, software developer, and AI enthusiast.

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.description:
We are hiring for a Machine Learning Solutions Engineer in London for one of our leading AI startups. You will work on the core tooling for customers, design and build scalable ML solutions on top of open source and enterprise products. As the Machine Learning Solutions Engineer you will deliver end-to-end technical expertise throughout the lifecycle of enterprise client-facing projects

Qualifications
- Strong computer science and system architecture foundations.
- Familiarity with linux based development.
- Experience architecting/applying technology to solve real world challenges.
- Experience delivering production-level client-facing projects.
